description: The [b]Image to Clipboard[/b] plugin enables users to [b]copy images to the clipboard[/b] using either an [b]Element ID[/b] or a [b]direct Image URL[/b]. Since the [b]Clipboard API only supports PNG[/b], all copied images are [b]automatically converted to PNG[/b], regardless of their original format (JPG, JPEG, GIF, WEBP, etc.). For [b]SVG support[/b], the plugin includes a [b]dedicated SVG Clipboard element[/b], which provides separate [b]copy and paste[/b] actions specifically for SVG images. ✨ [b]Key Features[/b] 📋 [b]Copy Images via Element ID[/b] – Select and copy images from any element containing an tag. 🔗 [b]Copy Images via URL[/b] – Fetch and copy images directly from a provided URL. 🔄 [b]Automatic PNG Conversion[/b] – Due to Clipboard API limitations, all copied images are converted to PNG. ❌ [b]SVG Not Supported in Standard Actions[/b] – Use the [b]SVG Clipboard element[/b] for dedicated SVG copy & paste functionality. 🖼️ [b]Supports Multiple Formats[/b] – Works with JPG, JPEG, GIF, WEBP before converting to PNG. 🎨 [b]SVG Clipboard Element[/b] – Allows [b]copy & paste actions[/b] exclusively for SVG images. 🚀 [b]Optimized for Performance[/b] – Fast processing with smooth clipboard operations. 🔗Demo Link: https://chakor-plugin-demo-7.bubbleapps.io/version-test/image_to_clipboard 🔗Editor Link: https://bubble.io/page?id=chakor-plugin-demo-7&test_plugin=1741339576263x625726221942521900_current&tab=Design&name=image_to_clipboard&type=page Our team is available to solve any problems or questions you may have, please open a thread on our support forum: https://forum.thechakor.com/t/plugin-issues
name: Image to Clipboard
plugin_instructions: 1️⃣ [b]Add the "Image to Clipboard" element[/b] to your Bubble page. 2️⃣ [b]Choose an action method[/b] – either [b]copy by Element ID[/b] or [b]copy by Image URL[/b]. 3️⃣ [b]For Element ID:[/b] Provide the [b]ID of the container[/b] holding the tag. The plugin will locate and copy the image inside it. 4️⃣ [b]For Image URL:[/b] Enter a [b]direct image URL[/b], and the plugin will fetch and copy the image. 5️⃣ [b]All copied images are converted to PNG[/b] – regardless of their original format (JPG, JPEG, GIF, WEBP, etc.). 6️⃣ [b]Use the copied image anywhere[/b] – paste it into image editors, messaging apps, or any clipboard-supported destination. 7️⃣ [b]SVG images are not supported[/b] in standard actions due to clipboard API limitations. 8️⃣ [b]For SVG support, use the "SVG Clipboard" element[/b], which provides two actions: [ul] [li][b]Copy SVG[/b] – Stores the raw SVG data to the clipboard.[/li] [li][b]Paste SVG[/b] – Retrieves and displays the copied SVG. 9️⃣ [b]Enhance your app's workflow[/b] by using copied images in forms, documents, or real-time image-sharing features.[/li] [/ul] 🔗Demo Link: https://chakor-plugin-demo-7.bubbleapps.io/version-test/image_to_clipboard 🔗Editor Link: https://bubble.io/page?id=chakor-plugin-demo-7&test_plugin=1741339576263x625726221942521900_current&tab=Design&name=image_to_clipboard&type=page
